svg.title: Bass Guitar Fretboard diagram GDAE - 4 Strings - 20 Frets
svg.desc:
Fretboard diagram for a bass guitar tuned to G D A E. Generated by FATpick, the tab player that listens. https://www.fatpick.com/
Create custom fretboard diagrams like this one at https://www.fatpick.com/tools/fretboard-generator.
